lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So thank god you put that on there. So as it (whoosh) lashes out, Trinket's armor actually takes the impact, and some of the teeth crack a little bit against the armor, and the jaw pulls back as Trinket just (bear moan) runs off behind the ice wall. What are you doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to cast Hail of Thorns.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Did you make a wisdom save last turn to try to resist the fear effect?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I did, and I failed it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's right. Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. So I'm going to cast Hail of Thorns on the dragon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go ahead and roll for attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 26 hits, yes. Hail of Thorns. What's the radius on that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a good question. Hail of Thorns.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) How's that go?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, wait. Next time you hit a creature with a ranged weapon-- spell-- range. It just hits it, but then everything within five feet makes a dexterity saving throw. Sorry, guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because you're prone, I'd say with disadvantage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Sorry, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nine?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, you're fine. Just straight roll.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, great. 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18? All right. You take half of the 1d10 piercing damage. So roll for the actual arrow damage, and then 1d10. The giant does not make it, and the dragon does not make it. They both fail.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 13 for the actual arrow, plus another five for Hunter's Mark.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. What's the 1d10 for the Hail of Thorns?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 18 for the Hail of Thorns.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18. So that's nine points of damage to you, Grog. Nine points to the giant, and nine points to the dragon. All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. And then I get another attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do. You have two attacks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (giggles) This is crazy! Okay, so I'm going to-- should I do Conjure Barrage? Conjure Barrage at them, as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Conjure Barrage is an action to cast, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, you're right. So a regular. I can only do a regular attack. Okay, so regular attack. Oh, that doesn't hit. That's a 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Rimefang is going to (flapping) fly up in the air.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, he's reaching for shit. He duplicates himself into another dragon. Now you're all dead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now he's going to--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh no, the ale's gone!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This way, up at the top, and is currently up in the air (flapping). Let's see. He gets his cold breath back. Oh, did you roll to try and shake the frightened effect, by the way?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I didn't.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and do that now.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Come on, darling. Come on!

lines.name: LAURA, TRAVIS
lines.text: Natural 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Rears back its head and then (whoosh) arc across the ground with its breath weapon, hitting Percy, Vex, and Lyra. You guys all need to make constitution saving throws.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, so there's no disadvantage roll for him to make here, is there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23 on the constitution saving throw?

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Yeah, I actually. I get five constitution, and I rolled an 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15? What did you roll, Vex?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18. All right. (chuckles) So as the ice breath (whoosh) passes across, it's like every center point of the worst ice storm or blizzard impacting you with a series of punches every single second as this breath caresses and beats your body left and right. Both of you guys take 54 points of cold damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 54. Lyra, you take 27 points of cold damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And the room gets quiet.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Really fast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It continues its flight pattern (flapping, impacts) and lands on top of this upper platform.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, he's got another fucking platform?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How high up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's ten feet up. There are two platforms on opposite sides of this room now. That ends its turn. It is now Grog's turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That giant is definitely against us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks to be questioning its loyalty at the moment, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You questioned at the wrong time. I charge Gary and hack away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You get up, and you have enough movement, definitely, to move up into battle with him. Go ahead and attack.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs) What do I do, again? What is this shit? This thing plus five. 16. No, attack bonus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have to hit first. You have to roll to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know. Jesus! It's like I've never done this before. 24.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, that was higher than 24.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 16 plus nine? Oh, it's 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits. Roll a second attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20 hits. Roll damage against the giant.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (quietly) What is this, 1d10 plus five? Oh, that's ten. 18. 18?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus six fire damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Six!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 24 on the first one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sorry, new math. 13 plus-- 17 on the second one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, and the third one?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 12, plus-- 15 on the third one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Dead? Dead!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Zahra, you're up.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: How far away from the dragon am I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are 30 feet away.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: That's exactly right, which means Witch Bolt is still in effect, and I'm going to fucking unleash on this white wyrm of death.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right! (boof) A third time, now, you release Witch Bolt. It slams into it. The dragon actually tries to shift out of the way--

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: He can't.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He can't, because you're locked in.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: You can't get away from me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Creepy Zahra!

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Damn!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You bad bitch!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so. It tries to dodge out of the way. This time, as you focus again, the yellowish energy has now transitioned to a deep, hot, searing red flame from your eyes.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Oh, you can't run!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (boof) You focus again. The beam now, transitioning into a similar red-hot color, streaks across and slams into the side of the dragon. You can see the impact. The scales are left with this glowing red heat from the blast, and part of its armor is torn open. You can see the burn-charred muscle beneath. The dragon's looking pretty rough. Do you wish to move, or are you staying right there?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I'm going to approach it by five feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. That brings us to Scanlan's turn. You are way over here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I cast Healing Word on myself?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Sure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, d4 plus five. That's nothing. Actually, wait. Can I just take a potion as a bonus action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, I'll just do that. I'll take a greater heal. 4d4 plus four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Anyway, I'll roll it later. Sorry. (counts quietly) Plus four is 11. Okay, I'm pretty much back up to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. Are you going to stay where you are?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm how far?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are over here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But how far?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh. It's 90 feet away from you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispering) Sniper shot. (louder) From the shadows, I cast Lightning Bolt, which has a hundred-foot range.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does, and because it's high enough--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If the angle is nice and clean.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, that's true. So out of the darkness, release a bolt of energy. It's going to attempt to make a saving throw. What's the DC on it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's my spell? What is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's whatever your spell DC is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17, okay. It does make its saving throw, so it is half damage. Go ahead and roll. Rolled a 16 plus five.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was 8d6, but now it's 4d6, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's 8d6 still. You roll the total, and it's halved.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, dude. Way not to be dead.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Way to not die.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I need my whoring partner.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: He looks disappointed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He doesn't want us to die.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: It's going to happen.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: No! Would you stop it, Lyra? Come on!

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: I'm sorry. I have self-esteem issues.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Not today, you don't.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 32 points of bludgeoning damage to you, Percy. (whack) From over the top.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percy is down as the tail (whack) slams him down. You can see now, as the tail pulls back, the ice on the ground is slightly concave. There's pieces of ice that have shattered and jutted up from the impact. As the tail pulls away, dropping chunks of stone and ice, you can see a currently unconscious Percy is now face-down and pushed probably a good half-foot into the ground itself. Your face is a mess, if they ever pull you up from that right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I like my face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are no giants; they're gone. Lyra, you're up.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Fireball. Ooh, that looks pretty good! Six and six and six.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Come on, Lyra. Killing blow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nuke him. Nuke the bastard.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: So that's 18, 28, 38, 52. 52 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 52 points? And what's the DC on your spell?

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: It's no DC. It just hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, but it has a save.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17. Okay, it rolled a 15 plus five, so it is half damage, but that's still 26 points of damage to it.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: It's not bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The whole cavern rocks from the sound of the impact. As the dragon pulls back, you can see this giant char mark on the outside of its wing. It's looking pretty rough. It's still standing, but it's looking pretty rough. Unfortunately, the radius of the blast, as it is a 20-foot radius, is large enough. Percy, his body is hit in the impact and blasted onto its back now. He rolls partly out of the impact--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do I actually roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You actually (boof) over there. You're still technically in the same spot, but you're on your back now. You do automatically fail a death saving throw from that.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Oh my god, I'm so sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just roll a ten or higher.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I did not roll a ten or higher.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You fail a second death saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh god!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vex, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (screams) Okay, here's the thing. Did he roll far enough away that he is not within ten feet of the dragon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The dragon is ten feet up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So he's far enough away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In theory, he'd be just out of the way of a ten-foot radius. A 20-foot radius, no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, then I'm going to Lightning Arrow the dragon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Do you have a potion?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Grog's got it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I have to attack? I do have to attack regular.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do have to roll the attack, yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's good. That's a 29.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 29 hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, so that is 4d8 against the dragon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, 4d8 lightning damage. What's the DC on it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14? It does not make the save. Rolled a three.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Come on, Vex. Come on. Do it for Trinket.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do it for Percy. Do it for Pike.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's not have another Pike, please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus your Hunter's Mark.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's good. That's another six for Hunter's Mark. Plus another 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One eye is partially closed, and with each breath you can see this frost mist emanating from its breath. It looks like it's on its last legs.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: For my second attack, I'm going to regular attack him. Oh my god. Just going to regular attack him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll for attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Jesus. Please. Oh! It's 30.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 30 hits. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Including the Hunter's Mark?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No! Four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so 19 total? Okay. As the arrow (arrow flying, impacts) embeds itself in the side of the neck, the dragon reaches up and it's scratching at the pain. As it pulls the arrow out, blood begins to pour down its side.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ugh, he's still alive!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's rough. That ends your turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck! Is it his turn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (heavy breaths, roars) and lets out a spray of icy damage out in this direction at an arc this way. I need to get a dexterity saving throw from Lyra, from Vex, and from Zahra.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Do I have a reaction?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: After this, you will.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Okay, got it.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 28. Okay. Zahra?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11. Okay, so that is 54 points of damage to you.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: I'm down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Lyra is currently (crackles) frozen in place right now from the blast. She's unconscious, and there is a coat of ice around her body holding her in place. How are you doing on hit points?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm at 28 hit points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you kick the frost off, and you're on one knee. And you take 54 points of ice damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you unconscious, too?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Nope. I'm not. Do I have a reaction?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have a reaction?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I do, I use Hellish Rebuke.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! What is that? It sounds hellish.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I know. I get one per day.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so the creature must make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So it does it back to him?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is 15. What's the DC?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so it takes 2d10 fire damage. Go ahead and roll that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes! Oh my god, you can kill it just because it attacked you?!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Kill it out of spite.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Tell him he's very ugly.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine points of fire damage? How do you want to do this? (cheering)

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I don't know what that means!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you finish this dragon with your Hellish Rebuke?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Make it good!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see Vex on the ground, about to fall unconscious. Your friends are lost in the darkness around you, and suddenly you feel that tiefling surge of anger within you, and you?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Almost completely turn into flame as I walk towards it. Can I use anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you want the Hellish Rebuke to be?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I want this Hellish Rebuke to be me levitating in the air and using my dark dragon staff to blast it from here down, just eviscerating everything from the bowels down with hellish fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see now, all of its armor begins to peel back as its chest is blown open. Its eyes suddenly go from this piercing blue-white to a dull gray color, and it reaches out, and (heavy breathing) "No." It tumbles forward onto the ground next to Percy, almost crushing his unconscious form. It gets up, (impacts) takes two more steps forward. "No. You can't."

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yes, I fucking can! (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I run over to Lyra, cast Seeming on myself to give myself the appearance of Aldor, and I pour a potion into her mouth, and I wake her up.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: What happened?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You did good, baby.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I run over to Percy and pour a healing potion in his mouth, and I don't "in him." (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can just barely get there with your movement. Thank god you're a barbarian.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh! What happened? Oh, look. It's dead!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Hello, Percy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god. I stand up and I give Zahra a giant hug.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can we cut that bastard up for scrap now? Ugh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You were amazing.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Forever besties?

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Wait, then I notice. Aldor, why are you so short?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Baby. I can't change height, so I release Seeming and I'm back to normal.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: That was not as good a kiss as usual. I was worried, but it was special.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh! (laughter)

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Is it time to take what we need from this thing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Gather up all of the shit we have to take and put it in the bag of stuff.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That would be: two white dragon eyes, one white dragon tongue, one white dragon heart, six white dragon claws, and 20 white dragon teeth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who's harvesting this?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: You have the bag.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: It's nature. Who has good animal handling?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, we have to harvest it special?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Part of harvesting the organs from the creature is a delicate process.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it nature? What is it a check for?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a nature-based check, yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have a low nature. What do you have?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Very low nature.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I have a six nature. Can I harvest him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I go and loot the giant that's not frozen?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can. You can also help with this roll.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Inspiration? Okay. I inspire them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you inspire Zahra as she goes to start carving into this dragon?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I go over to her and I'm like, (incoherent, impressed stammering). And that's all I got.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And with that, you killed a dragon.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: It was a group effort.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I help at all? Can I assist? Can I hold her utensils for her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Between the two of you working together, that would give you advantage on the checks. Which one are you going for first? Are you going for the eyes? Choose which portion you're harvesting first.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Everything. We need all of it, don't we?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, but which part are you harvesting first? You choose with each roll. You have eyes, heart--

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Can I assist? Can I help?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We already have an assist over there.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: I want to be helpful.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll all stand and watch.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Start with the eyes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pop them out. Pop those bitches out. But you get an advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You will get advantage on it because she's assisting you.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: That's nine plus--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, that's 15 plus six is 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21. Okay. As you come over, using a dagger that you have. Pop very delicately each dragon eye out and place it into the satchel.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Into the cooler bag.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you pull each eye out, it's like holding the coldest orb you've ever held. It actually burns your fingers as you clutch it. (gasp) Throw it inside and have to shake your hand off.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I jiggle them around in the bag. Just because.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: We have a special crate?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm holding it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The tongue would be next.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go ahead and roll for that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus another roll for advantage. Ooh, that's way better. Plus six. 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23, all right. So you manage to, with the help of Vex pulling the jaw open, Grog holding onto the side, Lyra's supervising. You manage to get to the base of the tongue, carve off-- And you (slurp-pop) pull out the rather massive, very heavy tongue-- which, once again, this in itself, is like (yelps). Put it in real fast. And in the process of doing so, you suffer two points of cold damage, but the tongue has been harvested.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A heart.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This one's going to be difficult. Part of the chest is blown open, exposing the interior, but there has been damage done to the inside, so go ahead and attempt this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Two rolls.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: 12. 14. Plus six is 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, 20! 20 is just what you needed. You pry in and crack open a portion of its body, and you begin to slowly carve out the portion, the heart, and the dragon heart itself is massive. It's huge, and it takes three of you to pull it out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How do we fit it in this bag? Is it magic?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know, but it's not going to fit in that satchel.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: How heavy is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say it probably weighs a good 200 pounds.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: I should know what people would do in the guild situation if they had an organ that wouldn't fit in the bag, right? We have to preserve it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Travel back quickly or have preservation magic. Whether it would be a necromancy-based magic.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're not shoving it in there? Are we cutting it in half?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We could roll it up in one of our fancy robes, though, and hold on to it. And pack it in-- oh, we, yeah! Let's chisel out some of the ice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you begin to wrap it up, you notice that the cold air begins to (cracking) crack around it, and the heart itself is freezing, as per the nature of a freshly dead white dragon. So it might be a good thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about all this gold in the cavern?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Claws and teeth.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Teeth. Yes, roll to carve. Seven. 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13. Going through the jaw, you begin plucking teeth out, piece by piece (cling, cling) and most of them, you notice, as part of the nature of the body, are beginning to decay faster than you expected. A lot of the teeth are becoming brittle and breaking, and as you start pulling them out, you're frustrated because with each one it seems to almost shatter as soon as you claw it from the jaw. By the end of it, you manage to gather about three dragon's teeth before the rest of them begin to break.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We have a shitload of dragon teeth left over.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But we need white dragon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He was a white dragon!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or wait, are you sure it wasn't the blue dragon that we harvested?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, it was a white dragon, we have 37 left over.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. We have 37 dragon teeth from the first white dragon.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Can I also get-- if there's any powder left or anything, for myself, I would like to--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Claws, still. We have to get claws still.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I know, but if it's on the ground, and it's in front of me, I would just like to put it in my little bag, to have it for my own spellcasting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go ahead and make a nature roll for that. Roll two more nature checks, or one more check, with advantage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Another one.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: That sucks, too. 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You managed to pull out some of the more sensitive parts of the dragon, but as you begin to cut away at some of the scales-- you're going for the scales or the claws?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I was going for the powdered-- the remains of whatever teeth that we couldn't get.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We still need claws.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's go for claws.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One more.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Nine. 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15? In beginning to pull out the portions of its hands and getting the base of where the claw itself begins to grow, you manage to pull out five functional dragon claws without them breaking.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: How many did we need, Percy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Six. Do we have an extra? We have one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys, prepared with your bag.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Hello! Prepared people!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, I looted the giant.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you looted the giant.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Now can we get some scales?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just her? All of us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All of you working together to get scales.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: All of us? Free for all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, this is the roll they're making for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 20 for scales.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It would be enough if you were to bring it to a master craftsman, to possibly construct a set of armor from them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's why we have so many pounds of dragon scales from the previous dragons! We could make three sets of armor right now.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: I'm going to look around and just see if there's a stash or a hoard that he was gathering.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, there are individual gold pieces embedded all through. It would take you weeks to chisel it all from the walls.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Are there any giant gems that we can see?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone make a perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to get my diamond back, too, from earlier.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I loot the bloody giant?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Natural 20 for perception! Ooh! Sparklies!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So Grog. You go over to the giant that's not frozen. Looking at it, most of its armor itself is made for a giant's form, much larger than anything else, and a lot of it has been shredded by the dragon, or frozen and broken from the impact and you, cutting it apart with its axe. For the most part, all you're able to find off of its body are approximately 120 gold pieces, which isn't bad. Giants don't really carry a lot of money on them, usually what they carry on them is just trophies from battles they fought previously. At least, these ones here. What did you roll for perception?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you guys are looking around, the cavern seems to be fairly barren. You, however, Vex, as you walk to the back of the cavern, you see there are other pieces of partially eaten frozen bodies. And you, using a little bit of torchlight you can pull out, and glancing underneath, you see a little bit of shining, more of a cluster of shining about seven or eight inches beneath the ice surface. And you look down and you can see, there appears to be quite a hoard of something frozen beneath the surface of this cavern.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Oh I can help! (blasting sounds) I throw a Fire Bolt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) You start carving, you're like, (yelps). Dodge out of the way just in time as firebolts begin blasting the ice.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: 14. 14 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (boom boom) A large chunk of the ice is blasted out from the Fire Bolt, and you catch your breath for a second. It's not enough to get all the way down, but it does manage to blast away a large portion of the ice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I still have like two points of health, FYI.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Oh! I'm sorry! You do look so lovely, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And so between the two of you guys, you take a dagger, you take your staff and you begin jamming into the ice. You manage to break it apart, and you do find beneath there, frozen, quite a hoard. You find over the next hour or so, 4,244 gold pieces--

lines.name: TRAVIS, TALIESIN
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How much?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 4,244 gold pieces. A cluster of gems worth around 850 gold. A singular diamond. It's about that large. It's actually a little bit smaller than the other one you have, but it's worth anywhere in the neighborhood of 1,200 gold pieces. You also manage to find a pair of leather gloves with almost gold trim around each one of the joints. You find what looks like a small leather cap that you pull over the head, that a peasant would wear, and what looks to be one glass vial containing an indeterminate liquid.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is the color of the liquid?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From what you can look at the color, it's like a purplish-blue.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Can anybody do a perception check on magical liquid?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would like to perception check the leather hat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can anybody do an arcana check on the leather hat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh. Do you have Detect Magic?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Or Identify spell?

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: No. I thought about them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Make an arcana check. Well, you guys have a brief rest here; it should be fine, actually. Okay. Looking at it, this is a very fancy leather hat.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Dibs!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm curious about the gloves, myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take some time with each one of these items that you pull out from the ice, and each one emanates a magical aura from them. You take the gloves first and you look at them, and you eventually come to realize, oh, you've heard about this, you read about this in your books. These are Gloves of Missile Snaring. They're gloves that when worn, you have an opportunity to possibly snatch a missile out of the air. These gloves seem to almost meld into your hands when you don them. When a ranged weapon attack hits you while you're wearing them, you can use your reaction to reduce the damage by a certain amount, provided you have a free hand. If you reduce the damage to zero, you can catch the missile, midair, (whoosh) stop it from hitting you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That might be good for you, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: For anybody with ranged, probably.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anybody who's hit by ranged.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have a two-handed ranged weapon, though, which you do not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking at the hat itself, while not a very impressive hat, the magical energy on it does give you the idea that it is used as an illusion-based magic. It is a Hat of Disguise. While wearing this hat you can use an action to cast the Disguise Self spell at will. It ends if the hat is removed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: May I have that one, please?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, Scanlan.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What? He can already disappear.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: You'll abuse it. You've already abused that privilege already.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sorry. By the way, your lips taste like bubblegum.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The potion is a Potion of Climbing. You can actually climb your walking speed for one hour.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Like Spider Climb?

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Spider Pig.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: What's it called?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It actually seems to be resisting the ice. You (cracking) break it out of the hand. The person who's holding the bow, currently, the upper torso is bitten off and shattered. Part of the body is ruined. The bow is broken and destroyed, but there is a quiver on its back. Within the quiver, you see most of the arrows are frozen solid within the quiver, but there is one that seems unaffected by the ice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I tell what it is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You pull out the arrow. It appears to be a deep forest green, and the actual shaft of the arrow has a texture to it, almost a rough metallic texture.

lines.name: SAM, MARY, TRAVIS
lines.text: Take it!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm taking it! Are you kidding me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Lyra, make an arcana check.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: This is a very interesting arrow. I haven't seen one of these like this. Oh, wait, maybe I have. 27.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good to know. You take the time with it. You immediately recognize, there is a similar enchantment on both of these weapons, and whoever came in here earlier had the intent of slaying this dragon and failed to do so. What you find is a Dragon-Slayer Longsword. Which is a plus-one weapon, normally, but against dragons or people of the dragon subtype, it deals an additional 3d6 damage with every hit.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: It's too bad it didn't work for them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And an Arrow of Dragon-Slaying. It's a singular arrow, a one-use arrow, but if it hits a dragon of the dragon race, type, or group, it has to make a constitution saving throw or take an additional 6d10 piercing damage. It's a one-use, "fuck you, dragon" arrow.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: That's very pleasant.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, right? What is the saving throw?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You'll see. You're going to get the paper.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So at this point, you guys have taken probably a good hour and a half or so in this cavern. You start seeing water drip.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, we should get out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's beginning to thaw in the absence of Rimefang.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Well, what's good is, I believe we're within the three days of the contract, yes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Possibly.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Well, we got the contract. We completed it within three days. Now, we have to get back.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yes, we've killed it, so let's go home.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percy, you go and you pull out the contract real fast to inspect it, and you can see that the arcane sigils that were built into it are faded, and where it looks like each piece of the dragon that you harvested correctly, has seemingly had a strange, glimmering gold shimmer from the actual text on the contract.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lyra, they're going to love you.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: It's so exciting. I can't wait to go to the mess hall and tell everybody, many times, over and over, how this happened together. And you guys, this has been an amazing journey. Thank you.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I would like to take just one gold coin right at the base of the head of what was formerly Rimefang for myself. I'll put it in a necklace when we all go back to town.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You take that one gold piece, pocket it. Take a moment to remember your final death blow against the dragon. You guys trek back through the caverns you arose, back through the ruined frost giant village, back into the Vesper Timberland, find where your horses were currently tied up, make your way back towards the city of Vasselheim. About a day and a half's worth of travel later, you notice that the blizzard that encompassed the six-mile radius of this mountain range has faded into a soft fog, and the actual weather in this area seems to have been connected to the presence of the dragon and is slowly dissipating. You eventually take yourself to the base of Vasselheim's main wall. You shout at the top of the wall, and noticing the group arriving, they let the doors open. You can see the giant, dragon-headed ballistae that line the city walls are armed and ready, and upon approval, they move them away. You enter the city, make your way through the Braving Grounds to the Quadroads to the outside of the Slayer's Take guildhall. As you enter the main room, you see Mertin is standing there. Looks like he's playing a game of solitaire with a deck of cards. He looks up. "Well, I'll be damned. Are you serious? You killed him?"

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Mertin, we did it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Show me your contract. Show me this contract."

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: I don't know why you'd doubt us. Really, it's right here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well done." And he puts his hand out to shake your hand.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: And then I just hug him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You've proven to be more than I expected. Let me get the Huntmistress. She will be very happy to "see that you've arrived. Aye, my wife. Yes." And he gets up and leaves. A few moments later, the headmaster Vanessa Cyndrial comes in, her tiefling self with her horns curled behind her head. Walks in with this smooth glare. "I must say. Some of these contracts we put out as a test of your power "and will, and to be perfectly honest, I was pulling for you." She puts out her hand and her husband takes a pouch of coin and puts it in her hand. She takes it and puts it on the side of her belt. "I'm impressed by all of you, and by this token, and by the completed contract. First off, "you have definitely proven your worth to the Slayer's Take."

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Oh my god, that is so sweet, Vanessa.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Keep the emotions in check. We have to put up a face here. No one wants to see a member of "the guild cry. Now, for the rest of you, I would like to humbly ask if you wish to join the "Slayer's Take guild."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, sure, that'll work. The bear, too?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The bear, as well. Best not show him the back room. We have a few trophies back there that "might freak him out."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we get to work with another leader next time?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What? Because if the answer is yes, we refuse. This is our leader from now on.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Thank you so much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You are able to choose what your group is at any time. Whatever the contract requires."

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Won't he, Vanessa?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vanessa goes, "Lyra, I would recommend this course of action to not be taken. I would think "that would reflect poorly-- I mean, your personal time is your own, but nevertheless, my dear, this "is a very pious house--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think this is a great idea.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Oh, no. Not you. You're such a friend to me. I can't ruin that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vanessa walks up and puts her hand on your shoulder and goes, "We're going to have a talk, "woman to woman."

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: (whispers) Oh my god, you guys, I'm in!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Be straight with her, will you? Please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm going to make sure she doesn't embarrass the rest of us. So with the contract "completed, provide what you've harvested from your quarry, and payment will be delivered."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I put the bag down that's got all the stuff in it. And then we take out a couple from the white dragon, and put out the other stuff. And we've got this giant heart right here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The heart, which Grog has been carrying on his back as you guys travel. (impact sound) It hits the table and the wood cracks a little bit beneath it from the impact. And you can see, the ice is starting to melt a bit on the exterior.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Careful, it needs to be preserved.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She gives a nod. "Very well. Mertin, please, provide these for transport to the contract "client."

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Can we ask who actually contracted it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's written on the contract itself."

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Oh, that's right. I'm so sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percy has the contract, currently.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I do. Ozwyn Grud?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Grundle?

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Alchemist Ozwyn Grud.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a history check, by the way.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: May I, as well?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, a history check? Four. He's a person.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I had four, as well. We are so getting shots later. Like, now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. The two of you immediately go, "Huh," and it hits you: you've heard the name before. You've heard the name and you're trying to figure out where it is. You pick it up and say, "He's a member of the Arcana Pansophical." It's a really exclusive group of archmages across the entire globe that essentially work together to keep the peace on a global scale. Of which, you know that Arcanist Allura Vysoren is a member of the Arcana Pansophical.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, of course.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is another member of that team, who ordered this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is most likely going to good use, at the very least.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So do we collect our money?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Indeed. What is the total on that contract, if you don't mind repeating?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was just working that out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lots of gold.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Lots of gold. It's 1,800 for the dragon eyes, 1,200 for the dragon tongue. 3,500 for the heart. 1,500 for the claws, and then how much for the dragon teeth?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Per dragon's tooth? Or for all six dragon teeth?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: For all 20 dragon teeth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Essentially, considering the dragon teeth that you had already stored, those are used in this transaction, as well as the claws. So you no longer have dragon's teeth and dragon claws stored in your bag. However, you've fulfilled the contract and get full payment for those.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We have 12 teeth left.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So it's 9,000 total?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 9,000 total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "9,000 gold pieces." She reaches beneath, pulls out a small chest. You see her do something beneath the table you don't recognize, and all of a sudden you hear a clicking sound and she pulls up three large sacks of gold (heavy impacts) on the table. "Divide as you see fit. On top of this, as "you have now been accepted to this, when your other team members arrive, which should be any "moment now, in the next day or so, you'll be inducted, you'll be absolved of your breach of the "laws of Vasselheim, and you will also acquire a small payment in conjunction with the hydra "contract. So we will discuss this as soon as your friends arrive. Until then, feel free to rest, "divide the gold, and be on your way."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's 1,500 each.

lines.name: SAM, TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Oh, I don't need any. (laughs)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about you, Zahra?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Oh, I need. I'll take, definitely. Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You do not need your money? Well, that will go back to the guild, thank you."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, she misspoke.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: She misspoke. I'm so sorry. She completely misspoke.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chuckles) "Very well." Tosses the coins.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 1,800 each.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well done. Congratulations, and I look forward to a very fruitful and profitable future "together here at the Slayer's Take."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Aye. Scanlan, should we go and make sure that your wounds are completely healed?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we insight check Vanessa really fast?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may. What are you trying to gather?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just to see what kind of person she is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go for an insight check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You know you have a very strong sense of being able to read a person, and yet she is still an enigma to you. She seems earnest. She seems definitely a shrewd businesswoman, and there's a reason this guild has been successful for as long as she's been at the helm of it. But as far as reading her intent? She seems very guarded and hard to read. You're unable to really catch a bead on her.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Vanessa, I want to thank you for trusting me with this very difficult task. I know that you sent some other people after this dragon, and your confidence in our abilities over theirs, who were defeated? It's just fantastic. I mean, what were you thinking?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What were you thinking?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What were you thinking, really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, to be perfectly honest, this dragon had been a thorn in our side, with previous "contracts failed on its side, and you all seemed so confident in your skills. I figured it would be "a good excuse for you to either flee from this thing and come back with your tail between your "legs, or be foolish and get yourself killed, in which case, you're not a problem of ours anymore "and everything's fine. Or, best case scenario, what you've shown to me today."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Which is that we're amazing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Vox Machina does not flee.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Never. Although I'm not a part of it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll make you an honorary member.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Anyway, I have business to attend to. Enjoy your night. Celebrate. And return here when you "wish to see your friends hopefully return as successful as you were."

lines.name: SAM, MARY
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We are sure they will.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Mertin!" "Yes, I know, my dear. I'm taking it." And he takes the heart and (grunts) lifts it over his back and the halfling, as thick as he is, (grunts) is bringing it to the back room. She turns around, gathers the rest of the materials into a sack, and exits the room. And with that, we will conclude tonight's session. Well done!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We did it!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: We survived!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good job, Mary!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You want to go ahead and take those?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have to split.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, you're moving.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Tonight?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Tomorrow.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: Oh my goodness.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First off, guys, a big round of applause and appreciation for our guests. Mary, Felicia. You guys were fantastic.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Guest dragon kill.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: That was very fun. Thank you for letting me guest and be on the Twitch channel. You guys are a joy to have. I'm so proud to be part of the Geek and Sundry family.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I would like to say thank you so much to the community, to the Critters out there. I've never felt so much love overnight and through this last week. You inspired me today, and all of us, so thank you so much.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Speaking of Critters, #CriticalRole is officially trending on Twitter right now on the front page. You guys should all keep that trend going and go tell us what you think about the show and your favorite moments from tonight with #CriticalRole, @GeekandSundry. A couple of other quick announcements. Thank you, Felicia, for coming out. She's about to leave for a month, right?

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: I'm going to 12 cities, then DragonCon. I'm pretty excited about it. I'm going all over. I'm sorry, Midwest. It'll be fun.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Speaking of her book, guys, we are 60 subscribers away, roughly, from doing another signed book giveaway. Subs are what keep this channel alive. We wouldn't be able to bring you this content without subscribers, so let's try to get that 60 before we're done reading all our donations and prizes and everything else. But actually, I think we're going to play that video of Felicia one more time really quick to support her book tour.

lines.name: FELICIA
lines.text: That's very sweet.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: We'll be right back, really quick, with our donations and everything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [end captions]
